thread.title: Two Guys Shooting Huge Ass Fireworks at Each Other Somehow Don't Kill Each Other
thread.title_full: Two Guys Shooting Huge Ass Fireworks at Each Other Somehow Don't Kill Each Other

author: Casey Chan on Sploid, shared by Casey Chan to Gizmodo
title: Two Guys Shooting Huge Ass Fireworks at Each Other Somehow Don't Kill Each Other
text:
Go to permalink GIF 
I’m not going to call these guys total idiots because if I had access to big fireworks, an empty street, and a camera, there’s a non-zero chance that I too would light those fireworks up, blast my friend in an awesomely stupid fireworks fight, and record the whole damn thing so that other people could call me an idiot. This wild, Harry Potter-like fight filled with colorful explosions happened in China during Chinese New Year. Advertisement 
It seems just slightly dangerous as the street fills with smoke and the fireworks are still shooting and you don’t know where anyone is—but at the end of it all, the guys run away laughing at their own idiocy.
